MGDL.TA.long_name: Migdal Insurance and Financial Holdings Ltd.
MGDL.TA.summary: Migdal Insurance and Financial Holdings Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides insurance, pension, and financial services for private and corporate customers in Israel. The company deals and manages pension plans, life and health insurance products, pensions, and financial business plans; and provides personal accident and retirement insurance solutions, and long-term savings, as well as insurance agency services. It also markets investments; operates nostro accounts; and manages financial assets, including mutual funds and portfolios, as well as engages in the investment banking and distribution activities. The company was founded in 1934 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel. Migdal Insurance and Financial Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Eliahu 1959 Ltd.
